name: DeployVisualStudioTestAgent
description: Deploy and configure Test Agent to run tests on a lab machine group.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Test Machine Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of Test Machine Group on which tests need to be run.

inputs.name: testMachines
inputs.label: Deploy to machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of machines where test agent needs to be deployed. For example: 'Machine1,Machine2,Machine3'

inputs.name: runAsProcess
inputs.label: Run Test Agent as interactive process to execute UI Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Denotes if test agent needs to run as interactive process.

inputs.name: machineUserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username with which test agent process needs to run.

inputs.name: machinePassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the username given above.

inputs.name: agentLocation
inputs.label: Test Agent Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to vstf_testagent.exe from network or local location. If no path is provided, it will be downloaded from http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=536423

inputs.name: updateTestAgent
inputs.label: Update Test Agent
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally specify if test agent needs to be updated.
